title: Ticket #6310: Some audit-related messages missing from normal schedd log
description: As part of the schedd audit log code, several dprintf() statements were added or modified to have a debug level of D_AUDIT|D_FAILURE. The intention was for these messages to always be written to the primary schedd log, and also be written to a D_AUDIT-only log (if configured). In reality, they are only written if the D_AUDIT level is enabled.
creator: jfrey
